original_text: This is what I will say to God: “Do not say that I am guilty. Tell me what bad things you think I have done. This is what I will say to God:
korean_text: 내가 하나님께 아뢰오리니 나를 정죄하지 마시옵고 무슨 까닭으로 나와 더불어 변론하시는지 내게 알게 하옵소서

sentences.original_text: This is what I will say to God:
Do not say that I am guilty.
Tell me what bad things you think I have done.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 무슨 악한 일을 했다고 생각하는지 말해 주소서.

sentences.original_text: This is what I will say to God:
